snippet: The figures raise concern that Europe is on the verge of a credit crunch that would cause a deeper recession than had been expected.
abstract: European Central Bank survey finds banks in the euro area cut lending sharply at the end of 2011; figures raise concern that Europe is on the verge of a credit crunch that would cause a deeper recession than had been expected.
lead_paragraph: The figures raise concern that Europe is on the verge of a credit crunch that would cause a deeper recession than had been expected.

headline.main: Survey of Banks Shows a Sharp Cut in Lending in Europe
headline.print_headline: Survey of Banks Shows a Sharp Cut in Lending in Europe
